metadata.name: The Awakening
metadata.description:
This piece is inspired by the idea of finding oneâ€™s true self and purpose in life. The girl represents the inner self, who is initially in a state of darkness and despair. The dark flowers symbolize the potential for growth and beauty that lies within her. The three lights are the sparks of inspiration, hope and love that guide her towards her awakening. Blue light represents hope and it gets smaller as it moves away from the other two lights,  grows as it gets closer to inspiration and love.They merge with her heart, filling her with light and joy. The tear that falls from her eye is a sign of gratitude and relief for having overcome her challenges. The flowers also become brighter as they receive the nourishment from her tear, showing that her transformation has a positive impact on the world around her as well as on herself. The music is composed in Garageband by me.

Digital Hand Drawing  
1500x2500 px  
30 FPS  
MP4
